record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - April 09, 2008)

[Page: H2099]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members have 5 legislative days within which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on H.R. 2016.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Arizona?
